title: Cooking Italian: Chicken Parmesan with Tomato Sauce

conversation.speaker: ChatBot

conversation.speaker: You

conversation.speaker: ChatBot
conversation.message: For Chicken Parmesan, you'll need chicken breasts, breadcrumbs, grated Parmesan cheese, eggs, marinara sauce, mozzarella cheese, and pasta. I can provide you with the detailed steps if you're ready.

conversation.speaker: You
conversation.message: Sounds good! Give me the steps, please.

conversation.speaker: ChatBot
conversation.message:
Certainly! Here are the steps:
1. Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. Dip each chicken breast in beaten eggs, then coat with a mixture of breadcrumbs and Parmesan.
3. Pan-fry the chicken until golden brown on both sides.
4. Place the chicken in a baking dish, cover with marinara sauce, and sprinkle mozzarella on top.
5. Bake for 25-30 minutes until the cheese is melted and bubbly.
6. Cook the pasta according to package instructions.
7. Serve the chicken on a bed of pasta with extra sauce. Enjoy your meal!
